md:
giải nghĩa từ "yous" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. You (pronoun) - Bạn, các bạn
	* Meaning: used to refer to the person or people being addressed.
	* Example: "You are very kind." - Bạn rất tử tế.
	* Related words: he, she, it, they, me, him, her, us, them
2. You (object pronoun) - Bạn, các bạn
	* Meaning: used as the object of a verb or preposition.
	* Example: "I gave you the book." - Tôi đã cho bạn quyển sách.
	* Related words: him, her, it, us, them
3. You (emphatic) - Bạn, chính bạn
	* Meaning: used to emphasize the person or people being addressed.
	* Example: "You yourself did it." - Bạn chính bạn đã làm điều đó.
	* Related words: myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, themselves
4. You (plural) - Các bạn, các người
	* Meaning: used to refer to a group of people.
	* Example: "You are all very talented." - Các bạn đều rất tài năng.
	* Related words: we, they, us, them
5. You (informal) - Bạn, các bạn (thông tục)
	* Meaning: used in informal situations to address friends or acquaintances.
	* Example: "You guys are coming to the party, right?" - Các bạn có đến tiệc, phải không?
	* Related words: buddy, pal, mate, friend

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and there may be other ways to use the word "you" depending on the context.

  1. You (pronoun) - Bạn, các bạn
    • Meaning: used to refer to the person or people being addressed.
    • Example: "You are very kind." - Bạn rất tử tế.
    • Related words: he, she, it, they, me, him, her, us, them
  2. You (object pronoun) - Bạn, các bạn
    • Meaning: used as the object of a verb or preposition.
    • Example: "I gave you the book." - Tôi đã cho bạn quyển sách.
    • Related words: him, her, it, us, them
  3. You (emphatic) - Bạn, chính bạn

    • Example: "You yourself did it." - Bạn chính bạn đã làm điều đó.
    • Related words: myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, themselves
  4. You (plural) - Các bạn, các người
    • Meaning: used to refer to a group of people.
    • Example: "You are all very talented." - Các bạn đều rất tài năng.
    • Related words: we, they, us, them
  5. You (informal) - Bạn, các bạn (thông tục)
    • Meaning: used in informal situations to address friends or acquaintances.
    • Example: "You guys are coming to the party, right?" - Các bạn có đến tiệc, phải không?
    • Related words: buddy, pal, mate, friend

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and there may be other ways to use the word "you" depending on the context.
